voice.text: Passages to Thais, Carlin, Ab'Dendriel, Venore, Port Hope, Ankrahmun, Liberty Bay and the isle Cormaya.

parameter.value: Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
My name is Captain Seahorse from the Royal Tibia Line.
This is Edron. Where do you want to go?
Welcome on board, |PLAYERNAME|. Where shall we sail today?
